title: can someone please explain this?
body: SO me and a couple of friends play casual LoL, and I'm the only one of us that has a level 30 account (the other two are still new) Now more lateley we've been getting queued against people of a higher skill level than us. I understand that when you win games your mmr goes up etc, but when theres only 3 of you and your highest summoner is a bronze level 30, why would you be getting put up against duo golds and silvers etc?  I'm getting pretty tired of having to put up with constant losses because these people are just way out of our skill level. Its putting my friends off playing with me and I don't really know what to do about it.

replies.body: Normals are Normals... I'm Silver and have played against a couple Challengers and A LOT of Diamond players on normals. Who cares.

It's normals

Normal MMR for the ranked people that always play ranked is generally pretty shit.
it's because they q'ed with a level 18? thought that would be obvious, nothing is actually wrong about that image it looks pretty normal
